sentences.en: And when the movement is running a tit - bit pant was a joke.
sentences.cn: 还有运动时没跑几步就大口大口喘气被笑话.

sentences.en: Any person waking from a nightmare will sit bolt upright and pant.
sentences.cn: 所有从噩梦中醒来的人都会坐直,大口喘气.

sentences.en: Caffeine can inhibit lung pant for parasympathetic nerve, reduce asthma attacks.
sentences.cn: 定肺喘咖啡因会抑制副交感神经, 减少气喘病的发作.

sentences.en: From my place of ambush, I could hear him pant aloud as he struck the blows.
sentences.cn: 我从藏身的地方可以听到他捅刀子时的喘息声.

sentences.en: He came in panting after running up the steps.
sentences.cn: 他跑上台阶，气喘吁吁地走了进来。

sentences.en: He was out of breath with whispering; I could hear him pant slightly.
sentences.cn: 他由于压低了嗓子讲话,变得透不过气来了. 我可以听到他在微微喘气.

sentences.en: I open my mouth and pant, longing for your commands.
sentences.cn: 131我张口而气喘.因我切慕你的命令.

sentences.en: Instead , a dog has to pant to keep cool.
sentences.cn: 一只狗必须通过气喘来保持凉块.

sentences.en: Pant styles include trousers, Bermuda shorts, pedal pushers and bell bottoms.
sentences.cn: 裤子的款式包括一般长裤 、 百慕大短裤 、 自行车裤、喇叭脚口裤等.

sentences.en: The babies ornament her ankles, dangle from her pant legs ( Carolyn Chute )
sentences.cn: 孩子们简直就是她脚踝的饰物, 随着她的裤腿摆荡 ( 卡罗琳丘特 )

sentences.en: The dog lay panting on the doorstep.
sentences.cn: 那条狗躺在门阶上喘着气。

sentences.en: They pant for an opportunity of revenging that humiliation.
sentences.cn: 他们伺机为自己受到的羞辱报仇.

sentences.en: This pant is too expensive, it is only 120 dollars in Shanghai.
sentences.cn: 这件裤子太贵了, 在上海只要120元.

sentences.en: We began to pant before we reached the top of hill.
sentences.cn: 我们在到达山顶之前已经在喘气了.

sentences.en: Well, the bike shop owner cut the pant legs off for free.
sentences.cn: 至于我得裤子嘛, 自行车店的店主免费帮我剪短了.

sentences.en: When he bent over, he split his pant.
sentences.cn: 他一弯腰就把裤裆裂开了.

sentences.en: You pant ( for breath ) after running hard for a time.
sentences.cn: 拼命跑一阵后便会觉得气短.

trans.tran_cn: （Pant） [人名] 潘特，[地名] [英国] 潘特

trans.tran_en: to breathe quickly with short noisy breaths, for example because you have been running or because it is very hot
to breathe quickly with short noisy breaths, for example because you have been running or because it is very hot

trans.tran_cn: 喘气，喘息，喘着气说，气喘吁吁地讲，热望，渴望，想，（机车等）喷气
trans.tran_en: to breathe quickly with short noisy breaths, for example because you have been running or because it is very hot
